title: 2 bedrooms and 1 living room for $1700
posting_body: 2 sunny bedrooms are available to move in, one bigger, one smaller, with one living room and one bathroom.
It’s very convenient to take transportation to CCSF and UCSF, One block away to Mission Ave, where has plenty of restaurants and buses stops like 14, 14R, 120, 130, and a Super Market two blows away.
It’s also very convenient to enter highway 280 S and N,
Utility fees not included in Rent
